description: Returns a list of the custom models that you have created with the CreateModelCustomizationJob operation.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Inventorying custom models can highlight which accounts own valuable AI assets and what capacity they control.
Knowing which models exist helps attackers decide which compromised identities grant the access they need to run or modify them.

incidents.description: AI-assisted cloud intrusion achieves admin access in 8 minutes

securityImplications: Attackers might use ListCustomModels to discover proprietary fine-tunes worth stealing or sabotaging and to gauge potential GPU spend to hijack.
